mean_cn: n. 示范表演，演示；实物说明；游行；表现
mean_en: a public meeting or march at which people show that they are protesting against or supporting somebody/something
sentence: He gave a demonstration of how to use the new smartphone.
sentence_trans: 他对如何使用新的智能手机进行了演示。
word_etyma: de加强 + monstr显示 + ation表名词 → 证明；示威游行
